titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res 68) making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2000, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-342, by Mr. Dreier.
Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 68 with 1 hour of general debate. Motion to recommit allowed. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 117.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 305.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/27/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.J. Res. 68 (continuing FY 2000 appropriations).
